name: storm-drain

effect.sun_moon: Redirects water moves without negating them or granting any Special Attack boost. Does not redirect hidden power.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Redirects water moves without negating them or granting any Special Attack boost. Does not redirect hidden power.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Redirects water moves without negating them or granting any Special Attack boost. Does not redirect hidden power.

short_effect: Redirects single-target water moves to this Pok√©mon where possible. Absorbs Water moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
